entry.tran: (用于 double, single 等形容词后)表示“…层的”
entry.def: -decker is used after adjectives like 'double' and 'single' to indicate how many levels or layers something has.

example.ex: ...a red double-decker bus full of tourists.
example.tran: 载满了游客的红色双层巴士

example.ex: ...a triple-decker peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
example.tran: 三层的花生酱和果酱夹心三明治

means.word_mean: 1. (often used in combinations) something constructed with multiple levels;
